entry.title: Elara Core v0.9.1 — Public Release
entry.summary: First public release. 34 MCP tools, 11 modules, pip-installable, documentation site live.
entry.content:
Elara Core v0.9.1 is now available as the first public release.

  • 34 MCP tools across 11 modules
  • Pip-installable package
  • Full documentation site live
  • 90+ passing tests
  • BSL-1.1 license
